Articles.Content:
New here, loving this game, just absolutely loving it!

Anyways, within my first 35 minutes of playing, I have managed to send my first kerbanaught into deep space. To put it into perspective, his orbit crosses with Jool.

He will not be returning home.

A moment of silence.

Lol, I hope to get acquainted with all you sometime in the coming weeks.
That's actually kinda impressive, to head straight out of the SOI that quick. Is he on a Solar Escape Orbit? If not, he can be recovered... We have the Technology...
That IS quite impressive. Now you'll just have to learn how to rendezvous so he can be rescued

Initially it was supposed to be an orbit around kerbin and when I tried to adjust his trajectory.

Poof.

Just wen flying off on into deep space.

His orbit does return to kerbin, but kerbin is always a few hundred thousand meters ahead. In the future I will try to recover him, right now I am working on launching and docking my refueling module on my station.

Sounds like you encountered the Mun gravity field on one of your orbits. That will kick you out into a solar orbit. If you have sufficient fuel left, he can be recovered but it will take a while before his orbit comes close enough for a burn to intercept Kerbal.
